articles.title: What Is a Bidet and Why Do You Need One? - Bigtime Daily
articles.description: Many Americans don’t know what a bidet is, let alone why you would need one. That’s because bidets (pronounced “bi-day”) are a French invention that have yet to become widespread in the US.  But they’re very popular in Asia, Europe, and the Middle East. For e…

articles.title: Novak Djokovic leaves behind Australia’s ‘white torture’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Refugees in same detention hotel that held superstar tennis player look to him for solidarity.
articles.content:
At least Novak Djokovic was able to go home.
During his short, sensational captivity in the Park Hotel, Melbourne, the worlds best tennis player was as close as any member of the public can get to a… [+7842 chars]

articles.title: Return of the flu: EU faces threat of prolonged 'twindemic' - TODAY
articles.description: BRUSSELS — Influenza has returned to Europe at a faster-than-expected rate this winter after almost disappearing last year, raising concerns about a prolonged "twindemic" with Covid-19 amid some doubts about the effectiveness of flu vaccines.
